New Records: Reynaldo Lopez achieved a historic ERA of 2.00 in his first regular season in Atlanta, tying for the lowest ERA in a season in Braves franchise history (minimum 130 IP)
Key Match Events: The Atlanta Braves beat the Kansas City Royals on Saturday night by a score of 2-1
Pre-Game Insights: Lopez had no problem converting to a starter's role in Atlanta, pairing with Chris Sale to help offset the loss of Cy Young candidate Spencer Strider
Post-Match Reflections: The Braves can clinch a wild card berth as early as Sunday
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Braves and Royals will play again on Sunday afternoon at 3:10 p.m. ET
